tool.name: FindOrphanedRelatedRecords

param.name: in_related_table
param.dialogReference: This input table. This table must be the destination / child table in a relationship class. Defining a feature class that is not part of a relationship class will return an error.
param.pythonReference: This input table. This table must be the destination / child table in a relationship class. Defining a feature class that is not part of a relationship class will return an error.

param.name: out_orphaned_table
param.dialogReference: The output report tables. It will contain the list of orphaned identifiers.
param.pythonReference: The output report tables. It will contain the list of orphaned identifiers.

tool.summary: A tool to find orphaned records within a table used in a relationship table. This tools finds the records in the input table that are not related to any records in its parent table.
